name: Rhythm Heaven Remake - Lockstep
description:
This is a remake of a minigame called Lockstep from an old rhythm game Rhythm Heaven (2009). In this minigame, march along with the music while switching between onbeats and offbeats. Try not to mess up and make your fellow stepswitchers mad.

I made this remake as a callback to my childhood days of "gaming" and also as a beginner's exercise in using unity.

Yes, there are a lot of missing features (especially practice mode), and there will probrably be a lot of bugs. I'm busy in IRL right now but maybe I'll come back to fix them after the exam.

All rights go to Nintendo, the owner of the Rhythm Heaven series.
